mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.service_name AS "serviceName", a.service_ip AS "serviceIp", a.service_port AS "servicePort", a.proxy_server_ip AS "proxyServerIp", a.service_state AS "serviceState", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_service( id, service_name, service_ip, service_port, proxy_server_ip, service_state, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{serviceName}, #{serviceIp}, #{servicePort}, #{proxyServerIp}, #{serviceState}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_service SET service_name = #{serviceName}, service_ip = #{serviceIp}, service_port = #{servicePort}, proxy_server_ip = #{proxyServerIp}, service_state = #{serviceState}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
